title: Word Coach
description: Relaxing crossword word puzzle game with 6,000+ levels.
shortDesc: Swipe, solve, and sharpen your vocabulary with 6,000+ crossword puzzles. Enjoy a relaxing and immersive word journey across beautifully designed worlds filled with daily challenges, brain boosters, and vocabulary training. A rewarding game for players of all ages.
roles: Led full development cycle using Unity with C# and Scriptable Objects.
Designed and implemented modular crossword and word-connect logic.
Built an adaptive level system with increasing difficulty and daily puzzle content.
Created relaxing themes with animated backgrounds, sound design, and visual polish.
Integrated hint systems, power-ups, and reward loops to boost player retention.
Managed Play Store deployment, ASO metadata, and app updates with new content.

contributions.name: Word Puzzle Engine
contributions.shortDesc: Created a scalable, dynamic word puzzle system with 6,000+ levels.
details: Designed a flexible level architecture to support crossword, anagram, and word-connect modes.
Implemented progressive logic with difficulty ramps and in-app progression tracking.
Integrated in-game hint mechanics such as letter reveals and shuffle.
Developed a level pack generator using curated word banks and difficulty metadata.

contributions.name: Visual & Audio Experience
contributions.shortDesc: Crafted a calming and elegant game atmosphere with responsive UI.
details: Designed animated world maps and themed backgrounds for each chapter.
Added audio feedback and ambient music to enhance puzzle-solving flow.
Created responsive UI layouts for all screen sizes and platforms.
Maintained accessible font sizes and contrast for wide age-range usability.

contributions.name: Retention & Monetization
contributions.shortDesc: Encouraged long-term engagement through daily puzzles and rewards.
details: Implemented daily puzzle rewards, achievement goals, and progression tracking.
Balanced soft-currency coin economy for hint usage and puzzle unlocks.
Enabled optional ad monetization for hints and retry bonuses.
Designed retention systems including monthly content drops and seasonal events.

contributions.name: Publishing & Live Updates
contributions.shortDesc: Managed store listing, build optimization, and versioning.
details: Published on Google Play with complete store metadata, icon sets, and feature graphics.
Performed QA, performance testing, and multi-device resolution validation.
Packaged lightweight builds optimized for low-end devices and offline access.
Released regular updates with bug fixes, new chapters, and puzzle packs.
